DOC.brief_summary: This is a comparative, open label, parallel group, non interventional study to further demonstrate the effectiveness and tolerability of Ectoin® Allergy Nasal Spray. In addition the effectiveness and safety shall be compared to a Beclomethasone nasal spray. The patient applies Ectoin® Rhinitis Nasal Spray or Beclomethasone nasal spray according to the instructions for use. The observation takes place over a period of 14 days. Response to treatment is recorded at day 7 and day 14 by the physician and in daily by the patient in a dairy.
DOC.brief_title: Application of Ectoin Allergy Nasal Spray in Comparison to Beclomethasone Nasal Spray
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed allergic rhinitis during the observational period Contra indications according to the label
